NATIONAL LABOR RELATIONS COMMISSION, SECOND DIVISION, and AIDA ARNAIZ, MA. ANA ARAMBULO, MAGDALENA CASTILLO ROWENA CONSTANTINO, JOJO MORILLO, IGNACIO RIMPOS, TERESA ROYECA, EVANGELINE SUMBILLA, LOLITA DE VEGA, FE MANGILIT, IRENE LUNA and NESTOR GUTIERREZ,

R E S O L U T I O N






ROMERO, 
J.:
In a decision dated June 22, 1998, consolidating the petitions of G.R. No. 112535 and G.R. No. 113758, the Court affirmed the award of money claims to the following respondents:










Julio B. Daet	P31,881.33


Emma R. Agustin	P31,901.88


Joselito A. Arambulo	P32,861.94


Evangeline B. Casas	P32,409.13


Gina Ciriaco	P31,972.48


Marieta R. Daet	P32,220.14


Elizabeth L. Deligos	P12,440.06


Alice C. Figura	P32,764.58


Grethel F. Garcia	P32,478.43


Ligaya A. Hidalgo	P32,639.09


Ellen I. Iledan	P31,850.27


Felina C. Pagtalunan	P22,520.92


Rosemarie Tonio	P23,226.99


Emmanuel C. Lumbera	P21,735.06


Cora Villa	P23,038.39










On July 10, 1998, private respondents in G.R. No. 113758 filed a motion seeking a clarification of their omission in the grant of money claims and other benefits.


Upon a review of the records, it is apparent that the June 22, 1998 decision indeed covered those respondents in G.R. No. 112535 but was not clear about those in G.R. No. 113758.


WHEREFORE, in view of the foregoing, the motion is hereby GRANTED. Accordingly, we MODIFY our decision dated June 22, 1998, to include private respondents in G.R. No. 113758, namely:














1.	Aida Arnaiz	P15,623.84


2.	Ma. Ana Arambulo	P12,077.00


3.	Magdalena Castillo	P15,310.28


4.	Rowena Constantino	P13,412.16


5.	Jojo Morillo	P12,251.05


6.	Ignacio Rimpos	P14,581.40


7.	Teresa Royeca	P13,792.82


8.	Evangeline Sumbilla	P15,774.72


9.	Lolita de Vega	P14,210.98


10.	Fe Mangilit	P15,507.51


11.	Irene Luna	P13,353.39


12.	Nestor Gutierrez	P13,410.04














SO ORDERED.


Narvasa, C.J., Kapunan and Purisima, JJ., concur.
